prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, Synth Lead, but without Synth Pad.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, but no Synth Pad.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, omitting the Synth Pad.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Bass, Piano, Guitar, and a Synth Lead, excluding the Synth Pad.
